q: Iraq. In an exclusive interview with ABC News, Donald Rumsfeld concedes that`` it's possible'' that decisions on how many troops to send into Iraq marked the biggest mistake of the war. In a war, many things cost lives, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News. Bernie Sanders praised the president's take on a wide range of issues that the Independent routinely fights for. The president covered a lot of territory tonight but the issues that stand out for me are the need for our nation to rebuild our crumbling infrastructure and create millions of new jobs, reduce our deficit in a fair and responsible way, and for us to make sure that Social Security remains strong not only for the present generation but for our kids and grandchildren, Sen.
